title: Special Preview - Up On Game with LaVar Arrington, T.J. Houshmandzadeh and Plaxico Burress - Should NFL Teams Let Players Make Personnel Decisions?
itunes:title: Special Preview - Up On Game with LaVar Arrington, T.J. Houshmandzadeh and Plaxico Burress - Should NFL Teams Let Players Make Personnel Decisions?
description:
LaVar Arrington, T.J. Houshmandzadeh and Plaxico Burress applaud Russell Wilson for openly sharing his thoughts on the lack of protection he has received in his tenure with the Seattle Seahawks but question if the front office should include the 8x Pro Bowl quarterback on personnel decisions. Plus, did the Houston Texans handle J.J. Watt’s contract situation the right way and what sort of impact will his release have on Deshaun Watson’s future? 


Subscribe, rate and review Up On Game today!

https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/up-on-game/id1542652485
